definition: to beat/to strike/to hit/to break/to type/to mix up/to build/to fight/to fetch/to make/to tie up/to issue/to shoot/to calculate/to play (a game)/since/from

sentences.english: Some played cards while others sat about a table and drank.
sentences.chinese: 一些人打牌，一些人围桌坐着喝酒。

sentences.english: I lost all my money yesterday playing poker.
sentences.chinese: 昨天我打牌把钱输光了。

sentences.english: I always play mahjong at Guo's house.
sentences.chinese: 这阵子我老是去老郭家打牌。

sentences.english: Most of the time we sit around playing cards .
sentences.chinese: 大多数时间我们围坐着打牌。

sentences.english: Though it would be a long journey there, we can always play cards on the train.
sentences.chinese: 虽然路途会远一些，但是我们可以在火车上打牌啊。

sentences.english: I love playing cards with Bob, because Ikill him every time.
sentences.chinese: 我最喜欢和鲍打牌，因为我每回都赢他。

sentences.english: Some played cards, some sat about a table and drank.
sentences.chinese: 一些人打牌，一些人围桌坐着喝酒。

sentences.english: They are playing card wholeheartedly, with the door open.
sentences.chinese: 他们正在全神贯注地打牌，门还开着呢。

sentences.english: So you are ready for whatever line declarer chooses.
sentences.chinese: 所以你能够对付庄家任何的打牌线路。

sentences.english: It is hot on the mountain, and many people have retreated into the woods nearby to play cards in the shade.
sentences.chinese: 山上很热，许多人躲到附近的树林里，在树荫下打牌。

sentences.english: She and I whiled away the time on the train talking and playing cards.
sentences.chinese: 我和她在火车上闲聊和打牌，就把时间打发了。

sentences.english: "Phil wouldn't yell at the top dogs, " Horry said.
sentences.chinese: 杰克逊不想打牌球员喊叫，”霍里说。

sentences.english: He was a good student, but he liked to drink alcohol and play card games for money.
sentences.chinese: 他是个优秀生，但是他喜欢饮酒以及打牌赌博。

sentences.english: The odds are always against him when he plays cards.
sentences.chinese: 他打牌的事情运气总是不好。

sentences.english: You can meet friends, play cards, or just relax here.
sentences.chinese: 你可以来这里跟朋友聚会，打牌，或者是纯粹放松。

sentences.english: For guys, you might have a poker night.
sentences.chinese: 对于男士来说，你或许可以通宵打牌。

definition: gambling get-together/game of cards, mahjong etc
pai gow (gambling game played with dominoes)
to draw a tile (at mahjong)/to play mahjong
